channel.title: Problem running my server!
channel.description: since no-ip.org the website has got more updated im not sure what i did wrong my server is fine and when i run it i can get on it but only useing my client.. so i went to no-ip.org signed in and made my server name.no-ip.org and the host type is dns host (A) i dont know if i type the port right i usally use the default port but now it doesnt work so can some 1 tell me the right host for 43594 port please. or tell me wat port dns host (A)

item.title: Problem running my server!
item.dc:creator: @MoparScapeHelp MoparScapeHelp
item.description:
@MoparScapeHelp wrote:

Ok go to http://portforward.com/
2. Choose your Router
3. Click any game
4. Go to the website on the top
5. Should be 192.168.1.1
6. Then go to that website
7. Name should be Admin
8. Password should be Password
9. If not, contact your parents xD
10. Once your on, click PortForwarding/Triggering
11. Click Add New Service
12. For the server name for Whatever you want
13. Starting and ending ports are 43594, 43594
14. The server Ip Address is the Ipv4 address wich can be found doing “ipconfig” on cmd. The default is 192.168.1.4
15. Click apply, and now people can join your server!

Read full topic
